item.title: System Software
item.description: System Software The software of a computer consists of the programs which tell the hardware what to do. There are two basic types: system software and application software, System software is a permanent component of the computer that controls essential functions and provides a platform for application software. Application software is user-oriented: it enables users to perform specific tasks such as editing a document or browsing the web. It relies on, and runs within, the environment provided by the system software.
